title: ml5.js: Pose Estimation with PoseNet
description: In this video I cover pose estimation: finding the keypoints of person's pose and skeleton using the pre-trained machine learning model PoseNet (in JavaScript with p5.js and ml5.js).

timestamps.title: Important questions to ask about ML models

links.title: Teachable Machine: Image Classification
links.description: In this video, I train an image classifier and import the machine learning model into a p5.js sketch with the ml5.js library.
